boat.construction_details: Carvel, Strip planking in oak and yellow cedar - painted with yellow cedar deck over ply

for_sales.sales_text: 1999 Epoxy coated cedar strip plank construction. Bronze fittings. All sails in good condition 1999. Gaff rigged with Colombian pine mast and spars. Stainless rigging. On road trailer. Open to offers. Check out Winifred sailing. https://youtu.be/1Fr_pi8p_2E?si=PLerm4ZAkEl5DOag

boat.full_description: The original was built by Herreshoff in Bristol Rhode Island, Winifred has raced in Classic Regattas at Oban, on The Clyde, on Ullswater, at Holyhead, Medway, Cardiff Bay, Burseldon, Cowes, Yarmouth, Salcome, Plymouth, Fowey and Falmouth.
boat.name: Winifred
boat.short_description: Winifred is a replica of 1/2 rater Wee Winn, commissioned in 1892 by Blair Cochrane of Bembridge, Isle of Wight for Winifred Sutton.
